729086f-b.title: Richmond: Lily Pond Avenue - Galesville Court
729086f-b.text:
(1)
Lily Pond Avenue, east side, between Galesville Court
and Waterford Court, within the limits of Fort wadsworth,
UUnited States Government Reservation. Robinson's map of
1898 shows this mansion to have belonged to J. B. Whitney,
and Beers's 1874 map indicates it as the JJ. G. Ash mansion.
June 2, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(2)
a view of the rear of the house from near MoClean Avenue.
The view is southeast.
June 2, 1935
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729086f-b.folder: Lily Pond Avenue & Galesville Court, Staten Island, NY
